title: List of all Android 2d game  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android 2d game  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: FXGL
repoList.description: Java / JavaFX / Kotlin Game Library (Engine)

repoList.name: moblib
repoList.description: library for 2D android games

repoList.name: AndroidPunk
repoList.description: A port of FlashPunk for Android. FlashPunk is a free ActionScript 3 library designed for developing 2D Flash games. It provides you with a fast, clean framework to prototype and develop your games in. This means that most of the dirty work (timestep, animation, input, and collision to name a few) is already coded for you and ready to go, giving you more time and energy to concentrate on the design and testing of your game.

repoList.name: BluetoothPong
repoList.description: Android 2d pong game using libGDX library and Bluetooth.

repoList.name: World2D
repoList.description: Android 2D Game Library

repoList.name: mingdx
repoList.description: A small libGDX based Java game library

repoList.name: AescAPI
repoList.description: A 2D game library for Android

repoList.name: Air-Hockey-2d-Android
repoList.description: Air Hockey 2D Android Game using core vector drawing, without using any 3rd party libraries.

repoList.name: LabyrinthGame
repoList.description: A simple android 2D game using the libGDX library.

repoList.name: libGDX-game-Android
repoList.description: 2D Top-down game for Android made using libGDX library. (Second year school project.)
